page.title: 15ANDY HAMPERS.
page.content: Spreyton School visited Andy Hampers in 1985 to find out what they do there.It is only half a mile away so we walked. We were told that Mr.Anderton started the hamper business in 1963 with an investment of Â£60.Now it has a holiday business,a jewellery business and the hampers and it is getting bigger each year. At Spreyton they employ twenty,mostly local people who they train.Some of the young people who have just left school go to Exeter College to learn about office work, computers and things, once a week.At Hull,Andy Hampers employ twelve other people. The customer pays money each week throughout the year and at christmas they get their hamper of meat,cakes, wine,chocolates and all sorts.
